(AFORJOS)

The minimum requirements for information to be included on the fuel's refinery batch test
certificate are given below:
- Specification name, issue and any amendment number;
- Name and address of testing laboratory;
- Batch number or unique identifier;
- QuantitY of fuel in the batch;.
- propertLa tali"a a"0 inctuding specification liTlt, 19st method and result of test;
- noo!t!vo!ffi;itg q"aritcation ieference and quantity added;
- Name;ao;itu,io-i4!'otisio ieot certiticate aignatory or an electronic signature;
